==Features==
 * AtMega1284P with Arduino bootloader.
 * AR1021 as touch controller on I2C port (only required if you plan to use a touch panel)
 * LiPo charger with JST 2 battery plug.
 * Arduino programming header.
 * Micro-usb connector to charge the battery and run the board.
